response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, valued at $1,200,000. I understand its significance and would like to extend an offer to purchase it from me at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer not only provides you with an exceptional deal but also allows me to maximize the value of the product. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed to finalize the details. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
